pages.text: All Recipes of this mod are available on JEI(Just Enough Item). So we won't write every recipe in this book. Check out in JEI is recommended

Recipes in this mod:$(li) frying and cooking recipe:described in this book, $()$(li)Boiling recipe, $()$(li)Convertion between aspics and stews, $()$(li)Resting, $()$(li)Transfer fluid between containers.$()
